changes: Fixed: fixed a bug that caused login to fail for some users.
Fixed: fixed a bug that caused login to fail for some users.
Login functionality is currently disabled, while we investigate what is going on.
Added: changelog page. No one will read it, but it's there.
Fixed: release modal not displaying correctly on mobile devices.
Added: dynamic refresh of database content. This means that when someone adds or edits a work, other users will see the changes almost immediately.
Added: changelog modal. Dec can now annoy you with changelog messages. Yay.
Added: copying direct report links to the clipboard.
Release: Work management by registered users
Release: User and work management by administrators
